qas.question: When World War I started, what was the official US position?
When did World War I commence?
What German war policy precipitated US involvement in WWI?
What year did the US enter World War I?
The United States built its army prior to joining the war in what way?
When World War I started, what was the official UK position?
When did World War II commence?
What German war policy precipitated US involvement in WWII?
What year did the US enter World War II?
The UK built its army prior to joining the war in what way?

context: The United States originally wished to remain <a0_0><b5_0>neutral<b5_0/><a0_0/> when World War I broke out in <a1_0><b6_0>August 1914<b6_0/><a1_0/>. However, it insisted on its right as a neutral party to immunity from German submarine attack, even though its ships carried food and raw materials to Britain. In <a3_0><b8_0>1917<b8_0/><a3_0/> the Germans resumed <a2_0><b7_0>submarine attacks<b7_0/><a2_0/>, knowing that it would lead to American entry. When the U.S declared war, the U.S. army was still small by European standards and mobilization would take a year. Meanwhile, the U.S. continued to provide supplies and money to Britain and France, and initiated the first <a4_0><b9_0>peacetime draft<b9_0/><a4_0/>. Industrial mobilization took longer than expected, so divisions were sent to Europe without equipment, relying instead on the British and French to supply them.
